data.name: Cyberchaos 0.5.
data.description: Eto modifikaciya stilya Midnight Matrix Surfing - Global pod pryamoje prodolzjenije stylya Kiberhaos 0.4, a sobstvenno, eto est' Kiberhaos 0.5. Da, on teper' global'nyj i ne tak rezjet glaz. Slava russkomu lyudu, NS-anonimam, Rene-tyan, vsemirnym anarhistam i kiberpank soobschestvu!

data.name: XMAS
Dark Pastel for 8chan aka 8kun
data.description: This theme is built on top of Tomorrow, so be sure the select that in [Options] > Themes, and check "Apply to all boards". If there is anything I missed, feel free to tell me and/or edit the CSS yourself. I tried to keep it as simple as possible so others could take it and make their own themes.
